description:
Chief Mihara takes a bold step. Athena faces off versus Shirahime in what promises to be an epic match.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: A Declaração Para Misaki! O Sentimento Sob O Arco-Íris!
Dis-le à Misaki ! Cette pensée traverse l`arc-en-ciel.
Greif nach dem Glück, Misaki! Die Erfüllung am Ende des Regenbogens
Misaki ni Todoke! Kono Omoi Niji o Koete
Reach Out to Misaki! This Feeling is Over the Rainbow
みさきに届け! この想い虹を越えて
